1.ENGLISH: Snake, you of course know the saying "One for all, all for one."

2.ENGLISH: What is this, all of a sudden?

3.ENGLISH: Oh, I figured you'd need a lot of motivation, so I came prepared.

4.ENGLISH: You see... someone broke into my apartment today... that was you wasn't it.
4.FRENCH: Vous voyez... quelqu'un est entré par effraction dans mon appartement aujourd'hui... c'était vous, n'est-ce pas.
